props.name: position
props.description: Popover position

props.name: enableFlip
props.description: If true, tries to keep the popover in view by flipping it if necessary

props.name: className
props.description: Popover additional class

props.name: children
props.description: The reference element to which the popover is relatively placed to

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Accessible label, required when header is not present

props.name: headerContent
props.description: Header content, leave empty for no header

props.name: bodyContent
props.description: Body content

props.name: isVisible
props.description:
True to show the popover programmatically. Used in conjunction with the shouldClose prop.
By default, the popover child element handles click events automatically. If you want to control this programmatically,
the popover will not auto-close if the Close button is clicked, ESC key is used, or if a click occurs outside the popover.
Instead, the consumer is responsible for closing the popover themselves by adding a callback listener for the shouldClose prop.

props.name: shouldClose
props.description:
Callback function that is only invoked when isVisible is also controlled. Called when the popover Close button is
clicked or the ESC key is used

props.name: appendTo
props.description: The element to append the popover to, defaults to body

props.name: hideOnOutsideClick
props.description: Hides the popover when a click occurs outside (only works if isVisible is not controlled by the user)

props.name: onHide
props.description: Lifecycle function invoked when the popover begins to transition out.

props.name: onHidden
props.description: Lifecycle function invoked when the popover has fully transitioned out.

props.name: onShow
props.description: Lifecycle function invoked when the popover begins to transition in.

props.name: onShown
props.description: Lifecycle function invoked when the popover has fully transitioned in.

props.name: onMount
props.description: Lifecycle function invoked when the popover has been mounted to the DOM.

props.name: zIndex
props.description: z-index of the popover

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Maximum width of the tooltip (default 18.75rem)

props.name: closeBtnAriaLabel
props.description: Aria label for the Close button

props.name: className
props.description: Popover arrow additional className

props.name: isExpanded
props.description: Flag to indicate if select is expanded

props.name: isGrouped
props.description: Flag to indicate if select options are grouped

props.name: placeholderText
props.description: Title text of Select

props.name: selections
props.description: Selected item

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Adds accessible text to Select

props.name: ariaLabelledBy
props.description: Id of label for the Select aria-labelledby

props.name: ariaLabelTypeAhead
props.description: Label for input field of type ahead select variants

props.name: ariaLabelClear
props.description: Label for clear selection button of type ahead select variants

props.name: ariaLabelToggle
props.description: Label for toggle of type ahead select variants

props.name: ariaLabelRemove
props.description: Label for remove chip button of multiple type ahead select variant

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Callback for selection behavior

props.name: onToggle
props.description: Callback for toggle button behavior

props.name: onClear
props.description: Callback for typeahead clear button

props.name: variant
props.description: Variant of rendered Select

props.name: width
props.description: Width of the select container as a number of px or string percentage
Additional props are spread to the container <ul>

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Select Option

props.name: value
props.description: the value for the option

props.name: index
props.description: internal index of the option

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: flag indicating if the option is disabled

props.name: isPlaceholder
props.description: flag indicating if the option acts as a placeholder

props.name: isSelected
props.description: Internal flag indicating if the option is selected

props.name: onClick
props.description: Optional on click callback

props.name: sendRef
props.description: Internal callback for ref tracking

props.name: keyHandler
props.description: Internal callback for keyboard navigation
Additional props are spread to the container <button>

props.name: id
props.description: HTML ID of dropdown toggle

props.name: children
props.description: Anything which can be rendered as dropdown toggle

props.name: className
props.description: Classes applied to root element of dropdown toggle

props.name: isExpanded
props.description: Flag to indicate if select is expanded

props.name: onToggle
props.description: Callback called when toggle is clicked

props.name: onEnter
props.description: Callback for toggle open on keyboard entry

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback for toggle close

props.name: parentRef
props.description: Element which wraps toggle

props.name: isFocused
props.description: Forces focus state

props.name: isHovered
props.description: Forces hover state

props.name: isActive
props.description: Forces active state

props.name: isPlain
props.description: Display the toggle with no border or background

props.name: type
props.description: Type of the toggle button, defaults to 'button'

props.name: ariaLabelledBy
props.description: Id of label for the Select aria-labelledby

props.name: ariaLabelToggle
props.description: Label for toggle of select variants

props.name: variant
props.description: Flag for variant, determines toggle rules and interaction
Additional props are spread to the container <button>

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered inside the SingleSelect

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the SingleSelect control

props.name: isExpanded
props.description: Flag indicating the Select is expanded

props.name: openedOnEnter
props.description: Internal flag indicating whether select was opened via keyboard

props.name: selected
props.description: Currently selected option
Additional props are spread to the container <select>

props.name: id
props.description: id for the label.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Switch

props.name: label
props.description: Text value for the label

props.name: isChecked
props.description: Flag to show if the Switch is checked.

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: Flag to show if the Switch is disabled.

props.name: onChange
props.description: A callback for when the Switch selection changes. (isChecked, event) => {}

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Adds accessible text to the Switch, and should describe the isChecked="true" state. When label is defined, aria-label should be set to the text string that is visible when isChecked is true.
Additional props are spread to the container <input>

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Tab content area.

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Tab

props.name: href
props.description: URL associated with the Tab. A Tab with an href will render as an <a> instead of a <button>. A Tab inside a <Tabs variant="nav"> should have an href.

props.name: title
props.description: Tab title

props.name: eventKey
props.description: uniquely identifies the tab

props.name: tabContentId
props.description: child id for case in which a TabContent section is defined outside of a Tabs component

props.name: tabContentRef
props.description: child reference for case in which a TabContent section is defined outside of a Tabs component

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Tabs Component.

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Tabs

props.name: activeKey
props.description: the index of the active tab

props.name: onSelect
props.description: handle tab selection

props.name: id
props.description: uniquely identifies the Tabs

props.name: isFilled
props.description: enables the filled tab list layout

props.name: isSecondary
props.description: enables Secondary Tab styling

props.name: leftScrollAriaLabel
props.description: aria-label for the left Scroll Button

props.name: rightScrollAriaLabel
props.description: aria-label for the right Scroll Button

props.name: variant
props.description: determines what tag is used around the Tabs. Use "nav" to define the Tabs inside a navigation region

props.name: aria-label
props.description: provides an accessible label for the Tabs. Labels should be unique for each set of Tabs that are present on a page. When variant is set to nav, this prop should be defined to differentiate the Tabs from other navigation regions on the page.

props.name: component
props.description: The text component

props.name: children
props.description: Content rendered within the Text

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the Text
Additional props are spread to the container component

props.description: Content rendered within the TextContent

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the TextContent

props.name: component
props.description: The text list component

props.description: Content rendered within the TextList

props.description: Additional classes added to the TextList

props.name: component

props.description: Content rendered within the TextListItem

props.description: Additional classes added to the TextListItem
Additional props are spread to the container component

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the TextArea.

props.name: isRequired
props.description: Flag to show if the TextArea is required.

props.name: isValid
props.description: Flag to show if the TextArea is valid or invalid.

props.name: value
props.description: Value of the TextArea.

props.name: onChange
props.description: A callback for when the TextArea value changes.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Custom flag to show that the TextArea requires an associated id or aria-label.
Additional props are spread to the container <textarea>

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes added to the TextInput.

props.name: isRequired
props.description: Flag to show if the input is required.

props.name: type
props.description: Type that the input accepts.

props.name: value
props.description: Value of the input.

props.name: isValid
props.description: Flag to show if the input is valid or invalid.

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: Flag to show if the input is disabled.

props.name: onChange
props.description: A callback for when the input value changes.

props.name: isReadOnly
props.description: Flag to show if the input is read only.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Custom flag to show that the input requires an associated id or aria-label.
Additional props are spread to the container <input>

props.name: position
props.description: Tooltip position

props.name: trigger
props.description: Tooltip trigger: click, mouseenter, focus

props.name: enableFlip
props.description: If true, tries to keep the tooltip in view by flipping it if necessary

props.name: className
props.description: Tooltip additional class

props.name: content
props.description: Tooltip content

props.name: children
props.description: The reference element to which the tooltip is relatively placed to

props.name: entryDelay
props.description: Delay in ms before the tooltip appears

props.name: exitDelay
props.description: Delay in ms before the tooltip disappears

props.name: appendTo
props.description: The element to append the tooltip to, defaults to body

props.name: zIndex
props.description: z-index of the tooltip

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Maximum width of the tooltip (default 12.5rem)

props.name: className
props.description: Tooltip arrow additional className

props.name: className
props.description: TooltipContent additional class

props.name: children
props.description: TooltipContent content

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Bullseye layout

props.name: className

props.description: Sets the base component to render. defaults to div

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Gallery layout

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Gallery layout

props.name: gutter
props.description: Adds space between children. Options are sm, md or lg
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Gallery Item
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Grid layout

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Grid layout

props.name: gutter
props.description: Adds space between children. Options are sm, md or lg

props.name: span
props.description: The number of rows a column in the grid should span.  Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: sm
props.description: the number of columns all grid items should span on a small device

props.name: md
props.description: the number of columns all grid items should span on a medium device

props.name: lg
props.description: the number of columns all grid items should span on a large device

props.name: xl
props.description: the number of columns all grid items should span on a xLarge device
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: content rendered inside the Grid Layout Item

props.name: className
props.description: additional classes added to the Grid Layout Item

props.name: span
props.description: the number of columns the grid item spans. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: rowSpan
props.description: the number of rows the grid item spans. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: offset
props.description: the number of columns a grid item is offset

props.name: sm
props.description: the number of columns the grid item spans on small device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: smRowSpan
props.description: the number of rows the grid item spans on medium device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: smOffset
props.description: the number of columns the grid item is offset on small device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: md
props.description: the number of columns the grid item spans on medium device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: mdRowSpan
props.description: the number of rows the grid item spans on medium device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: mdOffset
props.description: the number of columns the grid item is offset on medium device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: lg
props.description: the number of columns the grid item spans on large device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: lgRowSpan
props.description: the number of rows the grid item spans on large device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: lgOffset
props.description: the number of columns the grid item is offset on large device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: xl
props.description: the number of columns the grid item spans on xLarge device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: xlRowSpan
props.description: the number of rows the grid item spans on large device. Value should be a number 1-12

props.name: xlOffset
props.description: the number of columns the grid item is offset on xLarge device. Value should be a number 1-12
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes for table body.

props.name: rowKey
props.description: Specify key which should be used for labeling each row.

props.name: onRowClick
props.description: Function that is fired when user clicks on row.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional classes for header.

props.name: children
props.description: Table elements [Head, Body and Footer].

props.name: className
props.description: Addional classes for Table.

props.name: onCollapse
props.description: Function called when user wants to collapse row.

props.name: onExpand
props.description: Function called when user wants to compound expand row.

props.name: variant
props.description: Table variant, defaults to large.

props.name: gridBreakPoint
props.description: Size at which table is broken into tiles.

props.name: borders
props.description: Indicates if border is visible on a compacat table.  Note that this can not be applied when using expandable

props.name: sortBy
props.description: Settings for sorting, which index and direction is sorted by.

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Function called when user wants to select row.

props.name: onSort
props.description: Function called when user wants to sort table.

props.name: actions
props.description: Additional cell displayed at the end of each row with dropdown of action items.

props.name: actionResolver
props.description: Function should resolve an array of actions for each row in the same format as actions.

props.name: areActionsDisabled
props.description: Function should resolve if action kebap is disabled for each row

props.name: bodyWrapper
props.description: Override to the default BodyWrapper renderer

props.name: rowWrapper
props.description: Override to the default RowWrapper renderer

props.name: rows
cells
props.description: Header cells to display in table. Either array of strings or array of string or cell object.

props.name: rowLabeledBy
props.description: Aria labeled by this property collapse and select.

props.name: expandId
props.description: Id prefix for expand buttons.

props.name: contentId
props.description: Id prefix for expanded content.

props.name: dropdownPosition
props.description: Position of dropdown from actions will be displayed.

props.name: dropdownDirection
props.description: Direction of from actions will be displayed.

props.name: header
props.description: Header to display above table for accessibility reasons.

props.name: caption
props.description: Caption to display in table for accessibility reasons.

props.name: aria-label
props.description: aria-label in table for accessibility reasons.
